## **Hours**

  * Monday - closed*
  * Tuesday - closed*
  * Wednesday 1-5pm
  * Thursday 1-5pm
  * Friday 1-5pm
  * Saturday 12-5pm
  * Sunday 12-5pm

 _*Monday - Tuesday tours available by advance by appointment at private tour rate.__[Email us](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#127b7c747d527a7d626277607a7d6761773c7d6075) or call us at 845-358-0774 to make appointment. _  
  
Group tours may be [requested](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#94fdfaf2fbd4fcfbe4e4f1e6fcfbe1e7f1bafbe6f3) 2+ weeks in advance. **Please email or call to inquire about private tour and group rate.**  
  
We are **closed** for these US Holidays: Independence Day (July 4), Thanksgiving Day (4th Thursday in November), Christmas Eve (December 24) and Christmas Day (25), New Year's Eve (December 31) and New Year's Day (January 1).

  * **Free -** Members

## **Jon Imber & Jill Hoy: Side by Side**

On View: October 11, 2025 – February 15, 2026  

This exhibition celebrates the profound artistic dialogue between two accomplished contemporary painters Jon Imber (1950—2014) and Jill Hoy (b. 1954). Like Edward and Josephine Nivison Hopper, Imber and Hoy forged a lifelong creative bond during their marriage. They continually challenged each other, explored color, form, and abstraction painting side-by-side in their studios and outdoors.
